strings.Value: "What, are you comparing us with what you read in your book?"
"Let's do it again. Right now."
"It will get even better. We have many nights ahead of us."
"Let's never get out of bed."
"Let's get married."
"Just be near me. Always."
"Find me after I die. Wherever I am."
"I want you to be happy, too. And I'm not going to push you around."
"Let's not think about the future. We're together. That's enough."
"The world can wait, Tristian."
"Did you think once would be enough for me?"
"We have to go. There will be time later."
{n}Tristian tosses his hair from his face.{/n} "That was... amazing. I did not think..." {n}The deva cuts himself short, thinking about something.{/n}
"What? Ah, you are talking about that... treatise!" {n}Tristian laughs.{/n} "No, I think I won't even try!"
"And days. The whole eternity. Our little eternity." {n}Tristian stops again.{/n}
"Wait a second. Let me catch my breath. We have a whole future. Our little eternity."
"You emit warmth, like the sun. But, {name}... Once, wandering among worlds, I saw eternity pass, and the brightest of suns dim. And I can't but think that once... you and I will be separated."
{n}Tristian wraps his arm around your shoulders.{/n} "And while we are together... I don't know how long it will last... I want you to be happy. Tell me what you want. Your wish is my command."
{n}Tristian thinks.{/n} "The {g|Stolen Lands}Stolen Lands{/g} have just one queen — the one who conquered them." {n}The deva smiles.{/n} "But I will be honored to be your Prince Consort."

{n}Tristian coughs, surprised.{/n} "Forgive me, Your Highness, but your subjects will be against it — someone must rule them! Anyway, I'll do everything in my power to make the queen happy." {n}The deva leans into you and kisses your neck.{/n}
"I see you kept my gift..." {n}Tristian strokes your hand.{/n} "As soon as this madness around is over, I'll take care of a wedding."
"I will take care about everything. As soon as this madness that's going on around you, is over. Until then I will be too busy protecting you."
{n}Tristian nods solemnly.{/n} "I promise. I will not leave you."

{n}Tristian lowers his head sadly.{/n} "You know that's impossible. I must return... to where I must be. But I know that merciful {g|Sarenrae}Sarenrae{/g} will not call me immediately after the victory over Nyrissa. You and I will have time."

{n}Tristian thinks for a few moments.{/n} "I didn't think about that... but I can try. No, not just try: I will turn all the worlds to find you — wherever you are and whoever you become." {n}Tristian kisses you tenderly.{/n}
{n}Tristian leans into you, presses his forehead against yours, and stays silent, his eyes closed.{/n}
{n}Tristian runs his fingers along your neck and kisses your shoulder.{/n} "Of course. I overthink everything, don't I?"

"You know. I have not been as sure as now, for such a long time. When I was Nyrissa's prisoner, I had no more freedom than a bird in a cage. I even doubted {g|Sarenrae}Sarenrae's{/g} mercy in my darkest hour. But with you... with you I'm not afraid of the future. I'm not afraid to make mistakes, because I know I will be able to fix them."
{n}Tristian raises his head, as if hearing something.{/n} "I would like to stay alone with you for a little while. If you do not mind."
{n}In response, Tristian holds you and pulls you close.{/n}
"Really? Come to me, my queen..."
{n}Tristian kisses your hand and pulls away.{/n}
